CustomField.formula: If(LEN( genesis__Address_1__c ) > 0, genesis__Address_1__c & ", " , "" ) & If(LEN( genesis__Address_2__c )> 0, genesis__Address_2__c & ", " , "" )& If(LEN( genesis__City__c ) > 0, genesis__City__c & ", ", "") & If(LEN(TEXT( genesis__State__c)) > 0, TEXT( genesis__State__c )& ", ", "") & If(LEN( genesis__Country__c ) > 0, genesis__Country__c & ", " , "" )& If(LEN( genesis__Zipcode__c ) > 0, genesis__Zipcode__c, '')
CustomField.label: Address
